'''Fatteh''' is a [[food]] item that the player can cook. The [[recipe]] for Fatteh is obtainable from [[Lambad]] at [[Lambad's Tavern]] for 2,500 [[Mora]].

Depending on the quality, Fatteh revives and restores '''250'''/'''400'''/'''550''' HP to the target fallen character with a 120-second cooldown. Like most foods, this cannot target other players' characters in [[Co-Op Mode]].

{{Special Dish|Kaveh|The Endeavor}}
